title: Neverlag的小问题
author: 梦之境
txt_content: 这个插件分清理怪物这种实体和掉落物这种，但是怪物清理的提示一直没出现，每次服务器积攒到怪物上限就会启动停止刷怪和刷动物，我不得不把上限关了，很难顶。我是cat端1.12.2

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
梦之境 发表于 2020-6-11 12:27
不顶用这个插件，应该是过时了
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=781034

replies.author: 梦之境
replies.txt_content:
もぺもぺ 发表于 2020-6-11 12:18
用别的插件来清理呢
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-723356-1-1.html
这个插件是不是必须重启，我用指令加载后 配置文件和帖子里的不对

replies.txt_content:
梦之境 发表于 2020-6-11 12:20

replies.author: 梦之境
replies.txt_content:
もぺもぺ 发表于 2020-6-11 12:49
你可以直接机翻
主要想知道怪物清理是哪一栏

replies.author: もぺもぺ
replies.txt_content:
梦之境 发表于 2020-6-11 12:50
主要想知道怪物清理是哪一栏auto-removal:
  enabled: true
  broadcast-message: '&6[ClearLag] &a已清理了 +RemoveAmount 个实体!'
  broadcast-removal: true
  autoremoval-interval: 460
  world-filter:
  # - this_world <-This world will be ignored during removal!
  boat: true
  falling-block: true
  experience-orb: true
  painting: false
  projectile: true
  item: true
  itemframe: false
  minecart: true
  primed-tnt: true
  item-filter:
  # - 264
  # - 444 <-This item-id will be ignored during removal!
  remove-entities:
  # - cow <- This mob-type will be REMOVED during removal!
  # - MINECART_MOB_SPAWNER
  # - Pig liveTime=100 <- This mob will be REMOVED if it's been alive for 100 ticks (5 seconds)
  # - Minecart !isMounted <- This entity will be REMOVED if it's NOT mounted
  # - Wolf !hasName <- This entity will be REMOVED if it doesn't have a name
  warnings:
        - 'time:400 msg:&4[ClearLag] &cWarning Ground items will be removed in &7+remaining &cseconds!'
        - 'time:440 msg:&4[ClearLag] &cWarning Ground items will be removed in &7+remaining &cseconds!'
复制代码

replies.author: 梦之境
replies.txt_content:
もぺもぺ 发表于 2020-6-11 12:52
下面remove是自己添加的额外清理任务吧，动物应该不计入自动清理吧

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: IceCC
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 All.Hail.CCC 于 2020-6-11 13:11 编辑 

neverlag的怪物清理似乎是个空壳,没任何用处.
建议使用(本人再用,非常推荐)clearentity,就是实体要自己一个一个加,要有耐心
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=723356
原来上面和发了同一个,那就无视我吧,如果是模组服不建议clearlagg哦
(模组的东西都无法识别的)
